title: Poland’s central bank forecasts inflation to ease, growth to accelerate in 2026
description:

title: Two births and 27 deaths in one village: Poland's tumbling birthrate
description:

title: Inflation down, GDP up, driven by consumer spending and KPO
description: Poland’s latest economic data surprised analysts: after a sharp drop in inflation, GDP growth for Q3 was revised up to 3.8% y/y. title: Poland’s Inflation Rate Drops, Surprising Analysts
description:
Poland’s preliminary year-on-year inflation rate has decreased to 2.4% from the previous 2.8%, marking a 0.4 percentage point decline. This reduction indicates a continued downward trend in inflationary pressures.
